help.title: Help & Support
help.howToUseDescription: Easy Song helps you Learn languages through music. Browse songs, watch videos, and study lyrics with translations and explanations.
help.playModeDescription: Watch the video and follow along with highlighted lyrics. Tap any lyric to jump to that part of the song. Toggle translations on or off as needed.
help.studyModeDescription: Dive deeper into each song with structured sections. Each section includes explanations, line-by-line playback, and detailed translations.
help.changeLanguage: How do I change the language?
help.changeLanguageAnswer: Go to Settings â†’ Language to change your learning language or interface language.
help.downloadSongs: Can I download songs for offline use?
help.downloadSongsAnswer: Currently, songs require an internet connection to play. Offline functionality may be available in future updates.
help.saveProgress: How do I save my progress?
help.saveProgressAnswer: Sign in to your account to sync your progress across devices. Your learning history and preferences will be saved automatically.
help.videoNotPlayingAnswer: Make sure you have a stable internet connection. If the issue persists, try closing and reopening the app, or restarting your device.
help.contactSupportDescription: Need more help? Our support team is here to assist you.

about.title: About
about.description: Learn languages through music. Watch videos, study lyrics, and improve your language skills with structured lessons.
about.studioDescription: We're passionate about creating innovative language learning tools that make education engaging and accessible.
about.creditsDescription: Easy Song uses YouTube videos for educational purposes. All song content, including lyrics and translations, is provided for language learning.
